page.title: 09Beacon Hill Brickworks
page.content: As you drive down Old Wareham Road there in front of you is Beacon Hill Brickworks.The Brickworks have been in business in Corfe Mullen since 1937. Their bricks are widely used. The shape of the bricks is very regular. Tests have also proved over many years that they are resistant to water.Tests have also proved that they are resistant to rain penetration. The Brickworks have a range of ten different facing and coloured bricks. All the bricks have been awarded the British Standard award, B5 187. Most of them can be painted by emulsions and resistant paints to give the bricks a smooth good finish. Bricks are available in packs of 100 and 1000. The costs vary in price from Â£95.00 to Â£116.00.
